title: The Cursed
description: Chandler Dixon has lived his whole life knowing that he was different. When he was nine years old, Chandler grew wings. At thirteen, he discovered an ability to shape-shift and fear of himself. He didn’t know his destiny was written long before he was born. Everything Chandler has ever known is ripped away when he’s attacked in the street. Forced to leave his home, the walls of Chandler’s life begin to crumble, leaving behind truth, deception and destiny.
author: Iyanna Orr
